name: Pears in Syrup and Mint
keywords: corn syrup, mint, pear, dessert, raw
recipeIngredient: 3 ripe pears (1 1/2 pounds), Bartlett, Comice or Bosc, whichever is least expensive

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the corn syrup, lemon juice, and mint together in a bowl.
Peel the pears and cut the flesh into 1-inch pieces. Add to the mixture, and refrigerate until cold.
Serve the pears in wine glasses with some of the syrup and mint.
